content: *♥* alea square *♥* by diana krenz _____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ this square is dedicated to my niece alea _____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ crochet level intermediate crochet terms us this pattern is available in english only abbreviations magic_ring - magic_ring round - round space/sps - space/spaces skip - skip st/sts - stitch/stitches slip_stitch - slip_stitch yo - yarn over lp - loop beg - beginning stand - standing chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet start with a magic_ring special stitches beg double_crochet - ch1 not a st single_crochet in same st/space ch1 round 1 in magic_ring start with a beg 2dccl ch1 2dccl 7 times fpsc/half_double_crochet/double_crochet - front post single_crochet/half_double_crochet/double_crochet insert hook from ch1 close with a slip_stitch in top of beg 2dccl and cut yarn front to back around the post of indicated st 8 2dccl 8 ch1 space beg2dccl - ch1 single_crochet into magic_ring or st/space ch1 double_crochet in same st/space round 2 skip all cluster 2dccl - yo insert hook in indicated space yo and pull up a with new color stand single_crochet in any ch1 space *ch7 single_crochet in same loop yo and pull through 2 loops 2 times yo and pull chain space 3 single_crochet in next chain space single_crochet in next chain space* repeat from through last 3 loops * to * around omitting the last single_crochet close with a slip_stitch in first puff - yo insert hook in indicated space and pull up a long st and cut yarn 20 single_crochet 4 ch7 space loop 3 times yo and pull through all 7 loops ch1 to close this chain does not count as a st - round 2 finished wide v - double_crochet ch2 double_crochet in same st/space picot - ch3 slip_stitch in back bump of first chain invisible join - https //www youtube com/watch v=vovi8duekqw _____________________________________________ i often use a standing stitch at the beginning of a round work these stitches as a normal stitch but at the beginning with a slip knot on your hook to start a round ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ design by © koernerklaus august 2025 it s not allowed to sell or publish this pattern or parts of it no uploading on social media copyright is mine round 3 skip all single_crochet - round 4 placement single_crochet with new color beg double_crochet in any ch7 space * 5 double_crochet picot 6 double_crochet in same chain space ch1 fpsc around the 2dccl from round 1 directly below ch1 fpsc around next 2dccl from round 1 ch1 double_crochet in next ch7 space* repeat from * to * around omitting the last double_crochet close with an invisible join 4 petals each with 2 fpsc 1 picot 12 double_crochet 2 ch1 space 4 ch1 space - round 3 finished round 5 skip all wide v-double_crochet and single_crochet round 4 skip round 3 work behind in sts and chain sps from round 2 with new color stand single_crochet in a ch3 space following any single_crochet *single_crochet in with new color stand wide v in 2nd
